amendment.description: To provide funds for the security and stabilization of Iraq by suspending a portion of the reduction in the highest income tax rate for individual taxpayers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3379 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 130.

action.text: Amendment SA 3379 proposed by Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S6954-6965, S6966; text: CR S6954-6955) To provide funds for the security and stabilization of Iraq by suspending a portion of the reduction in the highest income tax rate for individual taxpayers.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3379 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 130.
